Staked(address,bytes32,address,uint256,u.details: emitted when user stakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount: how much of deposit token was staked
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much of receipt token was received

Unstaked(address,bytes32,address,uint256.details: emitted when user unstakes an asset

params.depositTokenAmount: how much deposit token was received
params.receiptTokenAmount: how much receipt token was unstaked

params.amount: amount of AVAX to be staked*
amount of PNG_AVAX_ETH_LP to be staked*
amount of PNG_AVAX_USDC_LP to be staked*
amount of sAVAX to be staked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_ETH_LP to be staked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_sAVAX_LP to be staked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_USDC to be staked*
amount of AVAX to be unstaked*
amount of PNG_AVAX_ETH_LP to be unstaked*
amount of PNG_AVAX_USDC_LP to be staked*
amount of sAVAX to be unstaked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_ETH_LP to be unstaked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_sAVAX_LP to be unstaked*
amount of TJ_AVAX_USDC to be unstaked*

stakeAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Stakes AVAX in Yield Yak protocol

stakePNGAVAXETHYak(uint256).notice: Stakes PNG_AVAX_ETH_LP in Yield Yak protocol

stakePNGAVAXUSDCYak(uint256).notice: Stakes PNG_AVAX_USDC_LP in Yield Yak protocol

stakeSAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Stakes sAVAX in Yield Yak protocol

stakeTJAVAXETHYak(uint256).notice: Stakes TJ_AVAX_ETH_LP in Yield Yak protocol

stakeTJAVAXSAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Stakes TJ_AVAX_sAVAX_LP in Yield Yak protocol

stakeTJAVAXUSDCYak(uint256).notice: Stakes TJ_AVAX_USDC in Yield Yak protocol

unstakeAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes AVAX from Yield Yak protocol

unstakePNGAVAXETHYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes PNG_AVAX_ETH_LP in Yield Yak protocol

unstakePNGAVAXUSDCYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes PNG_AVAX_USDC_LP in Yield Yak protocol

unstakeSAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes sAVAX from Yield Yak protocol

unstakeTJAVAXETHYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes TJ_AVAX_ETH_LP in Yield Yak protocol

unstakeTJAVAXSAVAXYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes TJ_AVAX_sAVAX_LP in Yield Yak protocol

unstakeTJAVAXUSDCYak(uint256).notice: Unstakes TJ_AVAX_USDC in Yield Yak protocol
